titles.title: Authorizing the cleaning and repair of the mace of the House of Representatives by the Smithsonian Institution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Passed House without amendment. Directs the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to provide for the repair of the mace of the House of Representatives by the Smithsonian Institution.
